description: A Wordle game to wake up employee brains before starting work
name: Wordle Brain Teaser
long_description:
Play Wordle to get your brain ready for the day! Guess the 5-letter word in 6 attempts. Perfect for morning warm-ups or quick breaks.

How to play:
- Type 'new game' to start
- Enter 5-letter words to guess
- ðŸŸ© = correct letter and position

You have 6 attempts to find the word!
short_description: Play Wordle to warm up your brain - guess the word in 6 tries!
